::DrillBit::

"Yeah, I can replicate the arm. And with a little help, I think I can
reattach it." DrillBit examened the look, and configuration of KitKat's
other arm, for referance.
"I get working on it, right now. I brought some of my equipment with
me."
DrillBit walks off towards to his room, to start working on the arm.
"It might take a few hours." He says as he walks in to the room, and
sets to work.
